label.title: A checkbox to enable ZAF SDK support. See https://zendesk.box.com/s/bys22b6tldnopxuw0g3qhe3nhoaseqqo

helpText.title: Help text to explain the ZAF SDK support option. See https://zendesk.box.com/s/bys22b6tldnopxuw0g3qhe3nhoaseqqo
helpText.value: Check this box if the iframed website requires SDK support. For more information check out our developer documentation.

description.title: Embed any website in your Zendesk (formerly known as Sidebar Icon app). See https://zendesk.box.com/s/0c5a122j1hdgbx4yu6bqlktdtl1qfu03
description.value: Embed any website in your Zendesk (formerly known as Sidebar Icon app)
